alert.note: Alert for Mille Lacs (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 3:07AM CDT until May 13 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Rum River near Milaca 8NNE affecting Mille Lacs County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Rum River Milaca 8NNE. * WHEN...From now until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 300 AM CDT Friday, the stage was 6.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:00 AM CDT Friday was 6.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to level off and begin to decrease later today. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
